ISSUE.TITLE: REST API Documentation For GET Historic Process Instance Shows Wrong Response
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** The following link describes the "GET Historic Process Instance" REST API Request: https://www.flowable.com/open-source/docs/bpmn/ch15-REST#get-a-process-instance The response object in the documentation shows a page of 1 result: ``` { "data": [ { "id" : "5", "businessKey" : "myKey", ... "tenantId":null } ], "total": 1, "start": 0, "sort": "name", "order": "asc", "size": 1 } ``` **Expected behavior** Expecting an unpaged, single result from this request: ``` { "id" : "5", "businessKey" : "myKey", ... "tenantId":null } ``` **Code** N/A **Additional context** N/A

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Upgrade some maven plugins to their latest versions

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix JSON response example in documentation for getting a single historic process instance Fixes #3706
Fix JSON response example in documentation for getting a single historic process instance Fixes #3706
